juggling.translation[0].definitions[0].d: the skill of keeping three or more objects moving through the air by throwing and catching them
juggling.translation[0].definitions[1].d: the practice of changing things or arranging them in a way that makes it possible for you to do something
juggling.translation[0].definitions[1].e: It took a lot of juggling and rearrangement of figures before the loan was approved.
juggling.translation[0].definitions[2].d: when someone who has a good job in a profession they have trained for is also secretly involved in an illegal activity
